param.doc: A unix epoch timestamp that represents the time of the location.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Get the last known location of the object.

param.name: oid
param.doc: A string that uniquely identifies the object within the feed.

param.name: feed
param.doc: A string that specifies the name of the feed containing the object.

param.name: region
param.doc: A string that specifies the type of search region around the object. Circle only supported for now.

param.name: radius
param.doc: An integer that represents the radius of the circle region around the object in meters.

param.name: feeds
param.doc: A comma seperated list of feeds to search. Defaults to the feed of the object

param.name: startkey
param.doc: A string that identifies the object to begin the fetch. Defaults to empty.

param.name: fetchsize
param.doc: A integer that limits the number of objects to be fetched. Defaults to 20.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Search near the location of an object.

param.doc: A string that specifies the type of search region. Circle only supported for now.

param.doc: A string that identifies the object to begin the fetch. Defaults to empty.

param.name: region
param.doc: A string that specifies the type of region around the object. Circle only supported for now.

param.name: radius
param.doc: An integer that represents the radius of the circle region around the object in meters.

param.name: trigger
param.doc: An enum string that specifies the trigger condition. Valid values are Ingress, Egress, IngressAndEgress.

param.name: callbacktype
param.doc: A string that indicates how to post the notification. Currently, URL is only supported.

param.name: callbackurl
param.doc: An URL string to post the notification.

param.name: feeds
param.doc: A comma seperated list of feeds whose objects trigger this zone. Defaults to feed of the object.
